personalInfo.title: About Me üôã
personalInfo.description:
Working as an aspiring and dedicated Sr. Mobile Application Developer and having eight-years post qualification experience in iOS app development and deployment at Apple Store. 


I possess proven successful experience of creating, maintaining, and implementing source code for back-end functionalities mobile and web applications to work properly and also of designing and developing user interfaces. 


Equipped with first-class analytical and apt problem-solving skills; I am able to work on own initiative and as a reliable part of cross-functional team!!!

workExperience.title: Experience üíª
workExperience.description:
Upon obtaining my bachelor's degree in 2017, I secured positions within IT firms in Pakistan, where I acquired two years of professional experience. Subsequently, I transitioned to Finland and commenced employment as a Research Assistant at the University of Eastern Finland. 
Accruing a cumulative six years of experience within the Information Technology domain, I have actively engaged in various projects throughout my career.

items.title:
Apart from my professional engagements, I enjoy spending time being outdoors whether alone or with friends. I love to meet and know new people from diverse backgrounds. 

In winter, I like exploring coffee places and outdoor walks. During the warmer months, I enjoy cycling, playing futsal, and capturing picturesque landscapes of Finland. 

I am an aspiring chef and when indoors I prefer to watch sci-fi and fantasy genre movies and television shows. In my spare time I like to explore latest technology advancements in mobile and web development world and coding in my personal projects! üôåüë®‚Äçüíª!
